center.span: Announcement to the community about the latest information concerning the Colcord Distant Learning Plan.
Announcement to the community that the school campuses and services will be closed on Friday, April 10, 2020, in observance of Good Friday.
Letter from the district superintendent to the community concerning our district distant learning plan.
The Hyperdoc is a place where students and parents can go to access academic websites and resources during the State mandated mandatory school closure.
This is a page dedicated to providing our students, parents, and community members information and resources concerning COVD-19. Stay safe and well!

div.a: Up to date weather for Colcord

br.p: Colcord Public School office hours are from 8am-4pm through regular session. Administration and High school offices are closed at 4pm generally each day. Elementary offices are open during Hornets of Character hours after our normal school day ends.
